MODULE.name: AFE_MODULE_AANC
MODULE.description: Supports the Adaptive Active Noise Cancellation (AANC) feature.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_AANC_PORT_CONFIG
PARAMETER.description: Configures a port for the AANC algorithm.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: aanc_port_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tx_port_sample_rate
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Sampling rate of the source Tx port.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tx_port_channel_map_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of channel mapping for the Tx port signal carrying noise (X), error (E), and voice (V) signals.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tx_port_channel_map_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of channel mapping for the Tx port signal carrying noise (X), error (E), and voice (V) signals.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tx_port_channel_map_3
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of channel mapping for the Tx port signal carrying noise (X), error (E), and voice (V) signals.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tx_port_channel_map_4
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of channel mapping for the Tx port signal carrying noise (X), error (E), and voice (V) signals.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tx_port_channel_map_5
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of channel mapping for the Tx port signal carrying noise (X), error (E), and voice (V) signals.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tx_port_channel_map_6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of channel mapping for the Tx port signal carrying noise (X), error (E), and voice (V) signals.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tx_port_channel_map_7
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of channel mapping for the Tx port signal carrying noise (X), error (E), and voice (V) signals.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tx_port_channel_map_8
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of channel mapping for the Tx port signal carrying noise (X), error (E), and voice (V) signals.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tx_port_num_channels
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of channels on the source Tx port.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rx_path_ref_port_id
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: AFE port ID of the Rx path reference signal.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ref_port_sample_rate
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Sampling rate of the reference port.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_AANC_CFG1_V2
PARAMETER.description: Static configuration for the AANC algorithm.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: aanc_cfg1_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: frame_size
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Input frame size for voice, error, noise, and Rx path signals.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ad_gain_default
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Default adaptive gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ad_skip_k
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of samples to skip from the start of the frame.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_hist_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the energy estimate history buffer (for minimum statistics).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_hist_init_val
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Initial value of the energy history buffer.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prefilt_biquad_iir_num_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the numerator coefficient for the prefilter biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prefilt_biquad_iir_deno_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the denominator coefficient for the prefilter biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prefilt_biquad_iir_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Numerator coefficient for the prefilter biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prefilt_biquad_iir_deno
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Denominator coefficient for the prefilter biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spath_biquad_iir_num_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the numerator coefficient for the speaker transfer function biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spath_biquad_iir_deno_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the denominator coefficient for the speaker transfer function biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spath_biquad_iir_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Numerator coefficient for the speaker transfer function biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spath_biquad_iir_deno
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Denominator coefficient for the speaker transfer function biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wfilt_biquad_iir_num_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the numerator coefficient for the adaptive LMS biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wfilt_biquad_iir_deno_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the denominator coefficient for the adaptive LMS biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wfilt_biquad_iir_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Numerator coefficient for the adaptive LMS biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wfilt_biquad_iir_deno
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Denominator coefficient for the adaptive LMS biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_static_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the feedback gate on the static path. When disabled, this field completely frees memory and bypasses computation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_sample_frequency
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Sample frequency of the feedback gate. This frequency is static; it is related to memory requirements.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_fpath_iir_num_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the numerator coefficient for the feedback path IIR filter of the feedback gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_fpath_iir_deno_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the denominator coefficient for the feedback path IIR filter of the feedback gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_fpath_iir_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Numerator coefficient for the feedback path IIR filter of the feedback gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_fpath_iir_deno
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Denominator coefficient for the feedback path IIR filter of the feedback gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_spath_iir_num_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the numerator coefficient for the speaker path IIR filter of the feedback gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_spath_iir_deno_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the denominator coefficient for the speaker path IIR filter of the feedback gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_spath_iir_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Numerator coefficient for the speaker path IIR filter of the feedback gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_spath_iir_deno
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Denominator coefficient for the speaker path IIR filter of the feedback gate.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_AANC_CFG1_V1
PARAMETER.description: Static configuration for the AANC algorithm.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: aanc_cfg1_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: frame_size
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Input frame size for voice, error, noise, and Rx path signals.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ad_gain_default
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Default#[ #] adaptive gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ad_skip_k
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of samples to skip from the start of the frame.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_hist_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the energy estimate history buffer (for minimum statistics).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_hist_init_val
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Initial#[ #] value of the energy history buffer.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prefilt_biquad_iir_num_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the numerator coefficient for the prefilter biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prefilt_biquad_iir_deno_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the denominator coefficient for the prefilter biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prefilt_biquad_iir_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Numerator coefficient for the prefilter biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prefilt_biquad_iir_deno
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Denominator coefficient for the prefilter biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spath_biquad_iir_num_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the numerator coefficient for the speaker transfer function biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spath_biquad_iir_deno_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the denominator coefficient for the speaker transfer function biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spath_biquad_iir_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Numerator coefficient for the speaker transfer function biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: spath_biquad_iir_deno
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Denominator coefficient for the speaker transfer function biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wfilt_biquad_iir_num_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the numerator coefficient for the adaptive LMS biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wfilt_biquad_iir_deno_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of the denominator coefficient for the adaptive LMS biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wfilt_biquad_iir_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Numerator coefficient for the adaptive LMS biquad IIR filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wfilt_biquad_iir_deno
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Denominator coefficient for the adaptive LMS biquad IIR filter.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_AANC_CFG2_V5
PARAMETER.description: Dynamic configuration for the AANC algorithm.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: aanc_cfg2_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: adapt_anc_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables AANC.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alc_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the adaptive-level controller.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pre_filt_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the prefilter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rx_factor_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the Rx energy factor.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_factor_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the VAD factor.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the noise gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ad_alpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Learning#[ #] rate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ad_delta_g2_bound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Absolute#[ #] maximum of delta G2.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ad_gain_bound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum and maximum values of adaptive gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alc_cfg_sm_beta
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] beta for the adaptive-level controller.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alc_cfg_ftarget
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain curve#[ #] target of the adaptive-level controller.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alc_cfg_fthresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain curve#[ #] threshold of the adaptive-level controller.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rx_gate_cfg_sm_beta
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing beta for the Rx gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rx_gate_cfg_fthresh1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Curve#[ #] threshold 1 of the Rx gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rx_gate_cfg_fthresh2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Curve#[ #] threshold 2 of the Rx gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_cfg_fthresh1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Curve#[ #] threshold 1 of the VAD gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_cfg_fthresh2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Curve#[ #] threshold 2 of the VAD gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise#[ #] gate threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_trstep
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise#[ #] gate transition step.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the block gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_offset_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the block offset.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_sm_beta
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing beta for the block gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_discount_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Discount factor of the block gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_weight_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Weighting factor of the block gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_rx_vad_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Rx VAD threshold of the block gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_rx_offset_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Factor for generating an offset.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_thresh2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise gate threshold 2.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_thresh2targetgain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Safe target gain for noise gate threshold 2.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_discount_gain_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold on ANC gain that determines the dynamic discount factor.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_err_limit_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Safe target gain for the block gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_gate_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind noise detection feature.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_tran_step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Transition step for wind noise.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_min_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum#[ #] gain when wind is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_hangover
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: After wind#[ #] is detected, hangover before declaring no wind.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_sec_mic
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Secondary mic for#[ #] wind noise detection.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_cov_eps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Small#[ #] initialization constant for the covariance (per sample).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_det_th
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lower and#[ #] upper thresholds for wind measurement.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_detect_thresh_l32q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind detection threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_silent_thresh_l32q0
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind silence threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_c_alph
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing alpha#[ #] for the covariance statistics.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_cov_bit_shf
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right bit#[ #] shift for correction before converting to int32.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_ws_alph_inc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] alpha for the wind score when wind increases.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_ws_alph_dec
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] alpha for the wind score when wind decreases.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_boost_s16q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Boosting#[ #] self-standard deviation for wind determination.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_fact_s16q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Percentage#[ #] of low-frequency standard deviation in wind discrimination.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the saturation gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_pcm_thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold for a PCM sample before saturation (typically 2^15-1).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_count_thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold count to determine if saturation occurs.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_gain_thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold on gain to determine if saturation occurs.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_hangover_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of hangover frames when saturation is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_trans_step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain reduction delta when saturation is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_min_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lower limit of the gain transition target when saturation is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the proximity detector.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_trans_step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain#[ #] reduction delta when proximity is not detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_min_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lower limit of gain reduction.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_trigger_hangover
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Hangover before the proximity detector flag is accepted.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_dynamic_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Dynamically enables the feedback gate while AANC is running.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_criteria_type
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Type of normalization criteria for the feedback gate correlation method.

RANGE.name: Fully normalized with error and noise

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold to compare against the feedback criteria.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_sm_beta1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] beta for the XX, XE, and EE energies.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_sm_beta2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] beta for XE/sqrt(XX*EE).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_rx_discount_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Factor multiplied with Rx power for subtraction from correlation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_hangover
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Hangover#[ #] frames when feedback is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_trans_step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain#[ #] reduction delta when feedback is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_min_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lower limit#[ #] of the gain transition target when feedback is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: static_gate_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether the output gain is incrementally increased each frame to the default gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: static_gate_trans_step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Transition-up step in static ANC mode.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_min_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise#[ #] gate minimum gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_vthresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold for voice activity detection.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_sm_beta1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing on voice activity detection to estimate voice.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_sm_beta2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing on noise estimates.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_hist_min_val
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lower limit of the minimum energy used to protect division operation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Configuration mode of the noise gate.

RANGE.name: Default VAD minimum statistics estimate method
VAD probability weighted noise estimate method

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_thresh1p5
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise gate threshold used to turn on AANC (from the Off state).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_thresh2p5
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise gate threshold used to turn off AANC (from the On state).

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_AANC_CFG2_V3
PARAMETER.description: Dynamic configuration for the AANC algorithm.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: aanc_cfg2_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: adapt_anc_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables adaptive AANC.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alc_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the adaptive level.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pre_filt_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the prefilter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rx_factor_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the Rx energy factor.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_factor_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the VAD factor.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the noise gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ad_alpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Learning#[ #] rate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ad_delta_g2_bound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Absolute#[ #] maximum of delta G2.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ad_gain_bound
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum and maximum values of adaptive gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alc_cfg_sm_beta
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing beta#[ #] for the adaptive-level controller.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alc_cfg_ftarget
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain curve#[ #] target for the adaptive-level controller.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alc_cfg_fthresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain curve#[ #] target threshold the adaptive-level controller.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rx_gate_cfg_sm_beta
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] beta for the Rx gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rx_gate_cfg_fthresh1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Curve#[ #] threshold 1 for the Rx gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rx_gate_cfg_fthresh2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Curve#[ #] threshold 2 for the Rx gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_cfg_fthresh1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Curve#[ #] threshold 1 for the VAD gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_cfg_fthresh2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Curve#[ #] threshold 2 for the VAD gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise#[ #] gate threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_trstep
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise#[ #] gate transition step.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the block gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_offset_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the block offset.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_sm_beta
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing beta for the block gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_discount_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Discount factor for the block gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_weight_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Weighting factor for the block gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_rx_vad_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Rx VAD threshold for the block gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_rx_offset_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Factor for generating an offset.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_thresh2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise gate threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_cfg_thresh2targetgain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Safe target gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_discount_gain_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold on ANC gain that determines the dynamic discount factor.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_cfg_err_limit_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Block gate safe target gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_gate_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind noise detection feature.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_tran_step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Transition step for wind noise.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_min_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum#[ #] gain when wind is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_hangover
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: After wind is#[ #] detected, hangover before declaring no wind.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_sec_mic
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Choice of secondary#[ #] mic for wind noise detection.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_cov_eps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Small#[ #] initialization constant for the covariance (per sample).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_det_th
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lower and upper thresholds for wind measurement.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_detect_thresh_l32q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind detection threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_silent_thresh_l32q0
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind silence threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_c_alph
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing alpha for#[ #] the covariance statistics.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_cov_bit_shf
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right bit#[ #] shift for correction before converting to int32.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_ws_alph_inc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] alpha for the wind score when wind increases.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_ws_alph_dec
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] alpha for the wind score when wind decreases.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_boost_s16q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Boosting#[ #] self-standard deviation for wind determination.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_fact_s16q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Percentage of#[ #] low-frequency standard deviation in wind discrimination.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the saturation gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_pcm_thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold for a PCM sample before saturation (typically 2^15-1).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_count_thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold count to determine if saturation occurs.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_gain_thresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold on gain to determine if saturation occurs.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_hangover_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of hangover frames when saturation is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_trans_step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain reduction delta when saturation is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_cfg_min_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lower limit of the gain transition target when saturation is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the proximity detector feature.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_trans_step
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain#[ #] reduction delta when proximity is not detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_min_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lower limit of gain reduction.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_trigger_hangover
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Hangover before the proximity detector flag is accepted.

PARAMETER.description: Configures proximity sensor information at runtime.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: aanc_prox_det_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_detect_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the proximity detector flag.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_AANC_STATS_V3
PARAMETER.description: Logs AANC algorithm tuning variables. Currently, this parameter is#[ #] used for logging the internal variables.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: aanc_stats_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: frame_duration_in_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Frame duration for AANC variables (in milliseconds).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: frame_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Frame number of the AANC variables.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ad_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Adaptive#[ #] gain value.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: delta_g
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delta G#[ #] from the adaptive algorithm.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: out_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Output#[ #] gain, which is computed as adaptive gain * noise gate factor.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alc_data_sm_peak_x
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: ALC smoothed signal peak.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: alc_data_gain_x
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: ALC#[ #] gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rx_gate_data_sm_peak_x
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Rx gate smoothed signal peak.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rx_gate_data_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gate factor for the Rx power estimate learning rate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_data_detect_ratio
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Voice detection ratio.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_data_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Learning rate gate factor.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_data_min_eng
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum energy for noise estimation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_data_cur_eng
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Current energy for noise estimation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_data_nng_state
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: State of the noise gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_data_nng_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Factor multiplied with ANC gain to generate the final gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_est_x
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Peak estimate on X.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_est_e
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Peak estimate on E.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_sm_est_x
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothed peak estimate on X.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_sm_est_e
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothed peak estimate on E.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_gate_delta
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delta factor to be added to the filtered LMS.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_gate_offset
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Offset that is proportional to the estimate X and ratio.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_data_nsg_sat_count
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of saturations in the current frame.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_data_nsg_sat_hangover
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Hangover counter, which is positive if the saturation gate is active.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_gate_data_wnd_state
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: State of the wind gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_cfg_prox_detect_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Proximity detector flag.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_data_prox_state
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Proximity state.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_data_prox_hangover_count
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Proximity gate hangover count.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: std
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Standard deviation of the low-pass data.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: var_f
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Non-low-pass variance.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: std_f
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Non-low-pass standard deviation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: std_o
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lowest standard deviation of the other channel (low pass).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_meas
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Measure of the raw wind strength.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_sc_q30
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind score (probability of wind detection). A high number means there is more probability.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pri_wind_1q14
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Probability that wind is present in the primary channel (criteria 1).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pri_wind_2q14
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Probability that wind is present in the primary channel (criteria 2).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pri_wind_q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Probability that wind is present in the channel.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_sc_adj_q30
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind score, adjusted for all bad correlations.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_sc_adj_sm_q30
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind score, adjusted for all bad correlations and smoothed.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_gate_data_wind_detect_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind detection flag.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_channels
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of wind#[ #] channels.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_corr_xe
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Correlation score for XE.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_var_xx
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Variance of XX to normalize XY.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_var_ee
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Variance of EE to normalize XY.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_corr_sm_xe
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smooth correlation score for XE.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_var_sm_xx
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smooth variance for XX.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_var_sm_ee
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smooth variance for EE.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_criteria
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Final criteria computed from the smooth score and variance.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_hangover_counts
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Frame counts to turn off ANC when feedback is detected.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fb_gate_rx_eng
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Rx#[ #] mean square energy.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_data_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Voice detection flag.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_data_prob_est
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Voice estimate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_data_nv_eng
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Non-voice frame energy estimates with smoothing.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_data_noise_eng
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise energy estimates based on a multichannel noise reference.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_data_voice_eng
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Voice energy estimates based on a multichannel voice reference.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_data_min_eng
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum energy for noise estimation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vad_gate_data_cur_eng
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Current energy for noise estimation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_data_nng_state
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: State of the noise gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_gate_data_nng_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Factor multiplied with ANC gain to generate the final gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_est_x
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Peak estimate on X.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_est_e
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Peak estimate on E.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_sm_est_x
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothed peak estimate on X.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_sm_est_e
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothed peak estimate on E.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_gate_delta
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delta factor to be added to the filtered LMS.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: block_gate_data_gate_offset
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Offset that is proportional to the estimate X and ratio.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_data_nsg_sat_count
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of saturations in the current frame.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sat_gate_data_nsg_sat_hangover
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Hangover counter, which is positive if the saturation gate is active.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_gate_data_wnd_state
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: State of the wind gate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_cfg_prox_detect_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Proximity detector flag.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_data_prox_state
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Proximity state.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: prox_gate_data_prox_hangover_count
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Proximity gate hangover count.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: std_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Standard#[ #] deviation of the low-pass data.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: std_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Standard#[ #] deviation of the low-pass data.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: var_f_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Non-low-pass variance.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: var_f_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Non-low-pass variance.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: std_f_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Non-low-pass standard deviation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: std_f_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Non-low-pass standard deviation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: std_o_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lowest#[ #] standard deviation of the other channel (low pass).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: std_o_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lowest#[ #] standard deviation of the other channel (low pass).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_meas_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Measure#[ #] of the raw wind strength.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_meas_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Measure#[ #] of the raw wind strength.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_sc_q30_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind#[ #] score (probability of wind detection). A high number means there is more probability.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_sc_q30_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind#[ #] score (probability of wind detection). A high number means there is more probability.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pri_wind_1q14_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Probability#[ #] that wind is present in the primary channel (criteria 1).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pri_wind_1q14_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Probability#[ #] that wind is present in the primary channel (criteria 1).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pri_wind_2q14_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Probability#[ #] that wind is present in the primary channel (criteria 2).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pri_wind_2q14_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Probability#[ #] that wind is present in the primary channel (criteria 2).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pri_wind_q15_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Probability#[ #] that wind is present in the channel.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pri_wind_q15_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Probability#[ #] that wind is present in the channel.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_sc_adj_q30_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind score, adjusted for all bad correlations.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_sc_adj_q30_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind score, adjusted for all bad correlations.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_sc_adj_sm_q30_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind score, adjusted for all bad correlations and smoothed.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wind_sc_adj_sm_q30_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind score, adjusted for all bad correlations and smoothed.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_gate_data_wind_detect_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wind detection flag.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wnd_channels
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of wind#[ #] channels.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Used for alignment; must be set to 0.
